definitions.definition: The process by which something is dried.
definitions.example: This towel is still damp: I think it needs another dry.

definitions.definition: (UK politics) A radical or hard-line Conservative; especially, one who supported the policies of British Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher in the 1980s.

definitions.example: The clothes dried on the line.
Devin dried her eyes with a handkerchief.

definitions.definition: To exhaust; to cause to run dry.
For an actor to forget his or her lines while performing.
